# Darwhin Gomez

New York, New York | 347-491-2955  
Darwhin88@gmail.com  
[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin) | [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)

---

## Summary
Solutions-focused technologist with experience designing AWS architectures, automated data pipelines, and agentic AI tooling that shortens feedback loops and accelerates application throughput.

## Education
**City University of New York – School of Professional Studies**  
Master of Science – Data Science and Machine Learning, Expected Jan 2026, GPA 4.0  

**City University of New York – NYC College of Technology**  
Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems, Jun 2024, GPA 3.78  
Dean’s List (5x), National Honor Society

## Certifications
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  
- Google Information Support Certificate  

## Professional Experience
### Solutions Architect Intern  
**Amazon Web Services (AWS)** | Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed and presented secure, scalable AWS architectures tailored to enterprise client needs.  
- Developed proof-of-concept (POC) solutions integrating Generative AI (Bedrock) with data analytics (Athena, Glue) to discover actionable business insights.  
- Built and deployed a fully automated sentiment analysis pipeline processing over 1M records, enabling 5× faster feedback-to-action turnaround through real-time QuickSight dashboards.  
- Fine-tuned foundational models in Amazon SageMaker, achieving a 5% increase in output accuracy and an 8% reduction in toxicity.  

### Software Developer Intern  
**WOPLLI Technologies** | Remote, NY  
Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Designed a Virtual Credential System for decentralized identity ecosystems.  
- Configured and tested Azure environments for secure application hosting.  
- Developed API integration and testing scripts using Postman.  

### IT Support Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services** | New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows via Python scripts to reduce manual workload.  
- Monitored logs and security dashboards to escalate abnormal activities.  
- Supported VIP users with secure access (Active Directory, VPN).  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U)** | Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons covering IT support, Linux, PowerShell, and scripting for 200+ learners.  
- Maintained a 96% cohort graduation rate through data-driven instruction.  

## Projects
### Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant  
- Developed a personal agentic job search assistant using FastAPI and OpenAI GPT-4.1 for automated resume and cover letter generation.  
- Implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using PostgreSQL to store and retrieve personal work data as embeddings.  
- Reduced time to apply by 60% and boosted weekly applications by 300%.  

## Core Skills
- **Programming Languages:** Python (pandas, scikit-learn, PyTorch), R, SQL, JavaScript  
- **Data Science & ML:** Statistical Modeling, Forecasting, Anomaly Detection, Feature Engineering  
- **Data Visualization:** QuickSight, Power BI, Matplotlib, Seaborn  
- **Cloud Technologies:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB, Glue, SageMaker)  
- **Tools & Frameworks:** Git, Docker, CI/CD  

## Languages
- English (Fluent)  
- Spanish (Fluent)  

## Professional Communities
- Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers  
- CUNY SPS AI Club
